import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http';
import { Injectable } from '@angular/core';
import { environment } from 'src/environments/environment';
import { RatingAnimeResponse, StatusAnime, RatingAnime, RatingManga, RatingMangaResponse } from '../interfaces';

@Injectable({
  providedIn: 'root'
})
export class RatingService {

  constructor(private httpClient: HttpClient) { }

  setOrUpdateAnimeRating(rating: RatingAnime) {
    return this.httpClient.post<any>(environment.dbUrl + "rating/setRating", rating)
  }

  checkRating(rating: RatingAnime) {
    return this.httpClient.post<RatingAnimeResponse>(environment.dbUrl + "rating/checkRating", rating)
  }

  calculateAverage(animeId: string) {
    return this.httpClient.post(environment.dbUrl + "rating/calculateAverage", { animeId: animeId });
  }
  setOrUpdateMangaRating(rating: RatingManga) {
    return this.httpClient.post<any>(environment.dbUrl + "rating/setRatingManga", rating)
  }

  checkRatingManga(rating: RatingManga) {
    return this.httpClient.post<RatingMangaResponse>(environment.dbUrl + "rating/checkRatingManga", rating)
  }

  calculateAverageManga(mangaId: string) {
    return this.httpClient.post(environment.dbUrl + "rating/calculateAverageManga", { mangaId: mangaId });
  }
}
